NODE.nlcode:
[% linkNode ($HTMLVARS{default_node}, "log $$USER{title} out", {op => 'logout'}); %]
[% my @links; my $str; push @links, linkNode ($USER); push @links, linkNodeTitle ("user settings"); my $GNL = getNode('Gigantic Node Lister', getType('restricted_superdoc')); push @links, linkNode ($GNL) if($GNL->hasAccess($USER, 'r')); my $GCL = getNode('Gigantic Code Lister', getType('restricted_superdoc')); push @links, linkNode ($GCL) if($GCL->hasAccess($USER, 'r')); my $ss = getNode('system settings', getType('setting')); push @links, linkNode ($ss) if ($ss->hasAccess($USER, "r")); $str = join "
\n", @links; %]

root
user settings

NODE.title: Epicenter
